text: Hagi amanage huno Ra Anumzamo'a hie, Idomu vahe'mo'za kumira huvava hu'za vazankina amanea zamatrenuge'za omanigahazanki, knazami'na zamazeri haviza hugahue. Na'ankure Idomu vahe'mo'za zamagra'a vahera zamahe nefri'za zamasunkura huno zamantaze. Hagi zamarimpa hevava nehige'za hara azeri oti vava nehaze.
